Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.schemaValidation.model

Class ValidationResult

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.schemaValidation.model.ValidationResult
public class ValidationResult extends Object
Contains the results of a validation operation.
